name: Twine And Punishment
description:
a collection of twine adventures about queer outlaws in space! this bundle includes:

  • KEEP DREAMING, SPACE COWGIRL - an original game made for this bundle: a prologue.
  • THE HUNT FOR THE GAY PLANET - an interstellar adventure about queer autonomy. can you find the gay planet - or will it remain lost forever?
  • MISSION TO PLANET X - what's a cute girl like you doing in a flibberjib like this? a traditional choose your own adventure, a side-story to GAY PLANET.
  • WHERE IN THE GALAXY IS KREMLIN SAN ANTONIO? - follow the criminal mastermind's trail from planet to planet using the included GALACTIPEDIA of local planets!
  • STAR COURT - you're on trial! will you hire a lawyer, act as your own defense, or invoke an ancient rite of trial by combat?
  • AND THE ROBOT HORSE YOU RODE IN ON - a story of deception, greed, sex and unreliable narration in the old west, 2100 A.D.
  • CHARACTER SHEET - print this out and use it to track your progress through the different games, filling in your criminal dossier as you go!

together, these twine adventures constitute over 60,000 words of content! see the spiral as a starcaptain, an interplanetary spy, an agent of INTERSOL, a defendant in a trial masterminded by a vampire lawyer, and a bandit queen pulling one last heist.

twine is a free tool for making hypertext games - sort of like choose your own adventures, sort of like web pages, sort of like those weird old hypercard stacks. all of these adventures will run in your web browser.
